snippet.title: Flash mob wish for young Melbourne boy
snippet.content: Young Victorian boy Eitan has been battling leukaemia for four years but now he just wants to dance, dance, dance. The seven-year-old will star in a flash mob with hundreds of people at Melbourne's Federation Square on Wednesday as part of a charity wish. After spending years in hospitals since the age of two, he wants to become a viral internet star and wants to "make new friends". The dance to Justin Timberlake's Can't Stop The Feeling kicks off from 4pm. People are encouraged to learn the dance, via a video on the Make-A-Wish website, or turn up and cheer Eitan on. (C) AAP 2017
